DOC.brief_title: The Effects Exogenous Ketones Exercise Performance Young Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Males age 1840 Ability understand communicate English answer questionnaire interact research assistant Physically active ( defined engage moderatetovigorous exercise least 3 time per week , determine via validated questionnaire ) Diagnosed diabetes medical condition could affect metabolism . Diagnosed heart disease take antihypertensive medication . Competitive endurance athlete ( selfidentified engage specific endurance training triathlon , cycling , distance run compete race competition ) Recent ( last 3 month ) current consumption lowcarbohydrate ketogenic diet Current consumption ketone supplement Any contraindication vigorous exercise ( identify via physical activity readiness questionnaire [ PARQ ] )
